quotes.quote: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ رَحْمَةً إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
quotes.author: Quran 3:8

quotes.quote: There are six stages to knowledge: Firstly: Asking questions in a good manner. Secondly: Remaining quiet and listening attentively. Thirdly: Understanding well. Fourthly: Memorising. Fifthly: Teaching. Sixthly—and it is its fruit: Acting upon the knowledge and keeping to its limits.
quotes.author: Ibn Qayyim Al-Jawziyyah

quotes.quote: My heart is at ease knowing that what was meant for me will never miss me, and that what misses me was never meant for me.
quotes.author: Imam ash-Shafi`i

quotes.quote: One teardrop that falls from the eye of a believer out of love and fear for Him is better than this world and everything it contains.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ

quotes.quote: To completely trust in God is to be like a child who knows deeply that even if he does not call for the mother, the mother is totally aware of his condition and is looking after him.
quotes.author: Abu Hamid al-Ghazali

quotes.quote: Nothing hurts a good soul and the kind heart more than to live amongst people who can’t understand it.
quotes.author: Imam Ali bin Abi Talib

quotes.quote: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آَمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ
quotes.author: Quran 2:153
